mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_ATTACH, BOARD_HITS, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CODE_NO, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME FROM BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE_NO = ${boardCodeNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_CODE_NAME FROM BOARD_CODE WHERE BOARD_CODE_NO = #{boardCodeNo}
SELECT BOARD_CODE_NAME FROM BOARD_CODE WHERE BOARD_CODE_NO = #{boardCodeNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_ATTACH, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NO
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE_NO = #{boardCodeNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_COMMENT_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') BOARD_COMMENT_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT, BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT = C.BOARD_COMMENT_NO AND BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_COMMENT_NO = BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_COMMENT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NO, REPORT_KIND, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_ANSWER) VALUES (SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, ${memberNo}, ${boardNo}, #{reportContent}, #{reportTitle}, DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO REPORT_COMMENT (REPORT_COMMENT_NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NO, REPORT_COMMENT_KIND, REPORT_COMMENT_TITLE, REPORT_COMMENT_ANSWER, BOARD_COMMENT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, ${memberNo}, ${boardNo}, #{reportContent}, #{reportTitle}, DEFAULT, ${boardCommentNo})
